moduleMeta.name: routing
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: River routing using Kinematic Wave Method(Nonlinear Scheme using Newton's method), according to the Pfafstetter river network coding system

var.name: qin
var.description: lateral inflow of each flow interval in the whole basin(m3/s)

var.name: upstreamID1
var.description: ID number of the first upper subbasin of each subbasin

var.name: upstreamID2
var.description: ID number of the second upper subbasin of each subbasin

var.name: dx
var.description: length of each flow interval in the whole basin (m)

var.name: s0
var.description: slope of river bed of each flow interval in the whole basin (ND)

var.name: b
var.description: width of each flow interval in the whole basin (m)

var.name: roughness
var.description: Manning's roughness of each flow interval in the whole basin

var.name: row
var.description: row in the 2D map of each grid composing flow intervals

var.name: col
var.description: column in the 2D map of each grid composing flow intervals

var.name: ngrid
var.description: amount of grids composing flow intervals

var.name: nflow
var.description: amount of flow intervals in each subbasin

var.name: Dr
var.description: river depth of each flow interval (m)

var.name: q1
var.description: discharge of last time step of each flow interval(m3/s)

var.name: q2
var.description: discharge of current time step of each flow interval (m3/s)

var.name: Drw
var.description: water depth in the river of each flow interval (m)

var.name: qlin1
var.description: lateral inflow of last time step of each flow interval (m3/s)
